channel.title: Help making skill menus
channel.description:
I would like to make a skill menu where when under the Statistics tab and you click on the skill icon it open up the menu.
I have this in my code right now:
[code] case 2161: // Attack c.AttackSkillMenu(); break;[/code]
When i click on the attack icon it doesnt do anything. As a matter of fact if i click on ANY of them. it doesnt do anything.
Please help! thank you

item.title: Help making skill menus
item.dc:creator: @Foomanshoo Foomanshoo
item.description:
@Foomanshoo wrote:

Okay well i changed my code to this:

case 8654: // Attack //c.AttackSkillMenu(); c.showInterface(8714); break;

And nothing still opens upâ€¦

Read full topic

item.title: Help making skill menus
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

You have to make it open the skill interface witch is identified by a numeric value. and the case for a 317 would be 8654 not 2161

Read full topic

item.title: Help making skill menus
item.dc:creator: @Foomanshoo Foomanshoo
item.description:
@Foomanshoo wrote:

I would like to make a skill menu where when under the Statistics tab and you click on the skill icon it open up the menu.

I have this in my code right now:

case 2161: // Attack c.AttackSkillMenu(); break;

When i click on the attack icon it doesnt do anything. As a matter of fact if i click on ANY of them. it doesnt do anything.
